reset-password.password.not.equal: Two passwords are not the same
reset-password.new.passwordtip1: For your account security, please reset the login password when you first log in
reset-password.rule.min: The length of the password should not be less than {min}
reset-password.rule.max: The password length can not be greater than {max}
reset-password.rule.num: The password needs to contain numbers
reset-password.rule.lower: The password needs to contain lowercase letters
reset-password.rule.upper: The password needs to contain the capital letters
reset-password.rule.special: The password needs to contain special characters
reset-password.rule.num2: The password needs to contain numbers
reset-password.rule.lower2: The password needs to contain lowercase letters
reset-password.rule.upper2: The password needs to contain the capital letters
reset-password.rule.special2: The password needs to contain special characters
